com.mparticle.kits

Interface KitIntegration.ActivityListener

  • Enclosing class:
    KitIntegration

    public static interface KitIntegration.ActivityListener
    Kits should implement this interface when they require Activity callbacks for any reason.

    The mParticle SDK will automatically call every method of this interface in API > 14 devices. Otherwise only onActivityStarted(Activity) and onActivityStopped(Activity) will be called.
